author: COMSOL
description: This conductive heat transfer example shows how to define a heat source localized on a small domain using the Heat Transfer interface. The accuracy and the numerical cost of the different features to model the heat source are compared. The results bring guidelines to select the suitable option depending on the ratio between the source and surrounding geometry typical sizes.
label: localized_heat_source.mph
name: root
